CatDescriptText: Mr. Charlie Nolan, 824 Penn Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 1, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that high school students should strike in order to air grievances or to gain their objectives?"  Answer reads: "No, I don't think they should. They should be guided by their parents."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Charlie Nolan wearing striped hat and light colored shirt with patches that read "...uck" and "X Se... Parker", standing next to automobiles with buildings in background
